channel.title: Pages on Jiancong(Kevin) Zhu
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Jiancong(Kevin) Zhu

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I’m Jiancong Zhu, a passionate software engineer with a focus on backend development and data science. I hold a Master’s in Accelerated Data Science from Northwestern University and a Bachelor’s in Computer Engineering from UC Irvine.

I have strong experience in developing scalable systems, with skills in Java, Python, and C++. My expertise includes working with frameworks like SpringBoot, Vue, and React, as well as optimizing high-concurrency platforms. I have worked on quantitative trading strategies, data visualization, and real-time system performance optimization.

I’m particularly skilled in leveraging technologies like Redis, Apache RocketMQ, and Grafana to solve complex technical challenges. I’m constantly exploring ways to improve system efficiency and deliver impactful solutions. In my spare time, I enjoy playing piano, skiing, and exploring the outdoors.
